description.en: Mobit is a decentralized wallet interface on the Nervos Network (CKB) that connects to existing wallets to "easily and securely transfer assets between Bitcoin and CKB" using the RGB++ Leap protocol for a "seamless cross-chain experience." Built on CKB's secure Layer 1 and UTXO-based Cell model, Mobit integrates with the JoyID protocol to provide a passwordless, mnemonic-free experience for managing Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and CKB assets. Announced in July 2024, Mobit enhances cross-chain interoperability and DeFi interactions by leveraging RGB++ Leap for trustless, bridge-free asset transfers, acting as a wrapper to streamline asset management and trading within the Nervos ecosystem.
description.ch: Mobit 是 Nervos 网络 (CKB) 上的去中心化钱包界面，连接现有钱包，使用 RGB++ Leap 协议"轻松安全地在比特币和 CKB 之间转移资产"，提供"无缝跨链体验"。基于 CKB 安全的第一层和基于 UTXO 的 Cell 模型构建，Mobit 与 JoyID 协议集成，为管理比特币 (BTC)、以太坊 (ETH) 和 CKB 资产提供无密码、无助记词的体验。Mobit 于 2024 年 7 月宣布，通过利用 RGB++ Leap 实现无信任、无桥接的资产转移，增强跨链互操作性和 DeFi 交互，作为包装器简化 Nervos 生态系统内的资产管理和交易。

description.en: Enables easy and secure asset transfers between Bitcoin and CKB using RGB++ Leap, offering trustless, bridge-free cross-chain functionality
description.ch: 使用 RGB++ Leap 实现比特币和 CKB 之间轻松安全的资产转移，提供无信任、无桥接的跨链功能

description.en: Simplifies DeFi participation by offering a user-friendly interface for cross-chain asset management and trading within the Nervos ecosystem
description.ch: 通过为 Nervos 生态系统内的跨链资产管理和交易提供用户友好界面，简化 DeFi 参与

a.en: Mobit is unique as a wallet interface that connects to existing wallets, enabling seamless, trustless asset transfers between Bitcoin and CKB via RGB++ Leap without traditional bridges. Its JoyID integration offers a passwordless experience, and it enhances DeFi accessibility for BTC, ETH, and CKB assets.
a.ch: Mobit 作为钱包界面的独特之处在于它连接现有钱包，通过 RGB++ Leap 实现比特币和 CKB 之间无缝、无信任的资产转移，无需传统桥接。其 JoyID 集成提供无密码体验，并增强了 BTC、ETH 和 CKB 资产的 DeFi 可访问性。

q.en: How does RGB++ Leap work in Mobit?
q.ch: RGB++ Leap 在 Mobit 中是如何工作的？

a.en: RGB++ Leap enables trustless cross-chain transfers by mapping Bitcoin UTXOs to CKB Cells via isomorphic binding, allowing secure, permissionless movement of assets (e.g., coins and NFTs) without traditional bridges.
a.ch: RGB++ Leap 通过同构绑定将比特币 UTXO 映射到 CKB Cell，实现无信任跨链转移，允许安全、无许可地移动资产 (如代币和 NFT)，无需传统桥接。
